catalog_info.title: The History of Modern Political Philosophy
catalog_info.notes: theory_subfield This course, when taken for a letter grade, meets the General Education requirement for Ethical Reasoning. This course fulfills the requirement that one of the eight General Education courses also engage substantially with Study of the Past.
catalog_info.description: Political philosophy from Machiavelli to Nietzsche, with attention to the rise and complex history of the idea of modernity.
